name: Incongruous Isle
description:
Submission for the Make-A-Level (Leap Day 2020) Jam.  The theme for the jam was "Incongruous", meaning that something in the game must by out of place.  And so...  I made a platforming level where a few monsters just aren't where they should be.  XD
And, maybe giving the level just a little bit of a bizarre feel.
